body: In the spell lists and the short descriptions that follow them, the spells are presented in alphabetical order by name except for those belonging to certain spell chains. When a spell's name begins with “lesser,” “greater,” or “mass,” the spell is alphabetized under the second word of the spell name instead.
name: Order of Presentation
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Spells/Spell Lists/Spell Lists/Order of Presentation
